metadata.name: CHAPTER 1: A Little Light
metadata.description:
For your dreams and for those who are living those dreams, I hope 「idealism」 series will help you.

And I hope that my art will continue to be with you on that journey.

I hope that all of you who read this will not lose your ideals, dreams and live like that.

We will always have the light to pursue our dreams.


CHAPTER 1: A Little Light

All bidders will receive gift stamps.
In addition, the theme song will be added after the final chapter of the "idealism" series, and the sound source will be released to all final bidders of the series.


Artwork information:
Year: 2022
Resolution: 7000x8845 png 300dpi
